args: set -eo pipefail; SCRIPT=""; if [ -n "${GITHUB_WORKSPACE-}" ] && [ -f "$GITHUB_WORKSPACE/tools/mcp/mcp_server.py" ]; then SCRIPT="$GITHUB_WORKSPACE/tools/mcp/mcp_server.py"; else SCRIPT="$(find /home/runner/work -maxdepth 6 -path '*/tools/mcp/mcp_server.py' -print -quit 2>/dev/null || true)"; fi; if [ -z "$SCRIPT" ] || [ ! -f "$SCRIPT" ]; then echo 'MCP: mcp_server.py not found under $GITHUB_WORKSPACE or /home/runner/work' >&2; exit 1; fi; cd "$(dirname "$SCRIPT")"; exec python3 "$(basename "$SCRIPT")"
